short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attach and share files effortlessly from OneDrive, Dropbox, Box, Google Drive, Evernote and many more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you're in Gmail, wouldn't you love a button that you could just click to attach any of your cloud files to your email? 

Well, with Share and Attach Files in Gmail, you can! You can attach any of your cloud files too, like: Google Drive, Salesforce, Microsoft Excel, Dropbox files. You name it- we give you access with 1 little button right from your Gmail. 

This handy tool:
âœ… Saves you time from searching through numerous cloud platforms
âœ… Keeps everything in the cloud (great for Chromebook users)
âœ… Keeps your files off your hard drive so that you can have a faster computer. ðŸ’»

Try it today!
